name: Jewel Sweet! Classic Game
description:
Jewel Sweet! Classic Game is a wonderful game, Play the most popular puzzle game of the century with powerful new gems it has a simple gameplay, yet addictive, interesting and suited everyone.
Feature:
- 2 playing kinds: Arcade and Classic
- Cool different diamonds
- Beautiful mania blast effects.
- 100+ level and updating
- Top blasting diamond ranking board
